提供面向容器场景、Electron 场景和纯前端场景的快速集成解决方案，助力业务: Provide a fast and easy way to integrate the solution into your business, Electron and pure front-end scenes. Help your business to quickly deploy
提供从 VS Code 插件、OpenSumi 插件到 OpenSumi 模块三: Provide a solution from VS Code plugin, OpenSumi plugin to OpenSumi module. Perfectly support business customization requirements
提供可任意定制的布局系统，支持从简单的视图配置到布局模板研发的各类场景，支持从插: Provide a customizable layout system. Support from simple view configuration to layout template development of various scenes. Support from plugin injection of custom views
一款帮助你快速搭建本地和云端 IDE 的框架: A framework helps you quickly build Cloud or Desktop IDE products.
开发者工具 IDE 是辅助淘宝开发者开发商家应用的本地开发工具，包含本地调试、代: TaoBao Mini Program Studio is a local development tool for Taobao developers to develop their business applications. It includes debugging, code editing, real device preview, and release features. It covers the entire development process.
小程序开发者工具是支付宝开放平台打造的一站式小程序研发工具，提供了编码、调试、测: Alipay Mini Program Studio is an open platform tool for developing small programs. It provides coding, debugging, testing, uploading, project management, etc.
